# accessibilityValue()

**Instance Method**

Returns the radio button’s value.

## Declaration

```swift
func accessibilityValue() -> NSNumber?
```

## Return Value

`@YES` if selected; otherwise, `@NO`.

## Discussion

This method is the getter for the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAccessibilityProtocol] protocol’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAccessibility-c.protocol/accessibilityValue] property.
title: accessibilityValue()
